Package com.nickfiorentino.controller

Class WowController

java.lang.Object
com.nickfiorentino.controller.WowController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/nickswowapi") public class WowController extends Object
Main REST controller for Nick's WoW API application.

Exposes public and authenticated endpoints for managing and viewing:

  • Official World of Warcraft races, classes, and items via Blizzard's API
  • User-created characters stored in a PostgreSQL database
  • Inventory items equipped to characters

This controller connects the front-end or client to both internal database services and external Blizzard REST APIs. Uses Spring Security for access control and validation via Jakarta Validation.

Base URL for all endpoints: /nickswowapi

    • getAllOfficialRaces

      @PreAuthorize("permitAll") @RequestMapping(path="/officialraces", method=GET) public RaceIndexPojo getAllOfficialRaces()
      Retrieves all official World of Warcraft races from Blizzardâ€™s Classic API.
      Returns:
      a RaceIndexPojo containing the list of races

    • getAllOfficialClasses

      @PreAuthorize("permitAll") @RequestMapping(path="/officialclasses", method=GET) public ClassIndexPojo getAllOfficialClasses()
      Retrieves all official World of Warcraft classes from Blizzardâ€™s Classic API.
      Returns:

    • getItemsInRange

      @PreAuthorize("permitAll") @RequestMapping(path="/officialitems", method=GET) public List<ItemPojo> getItemsInRange(int startId, int endId)
      Retrieves a list of WoW items from the Blizzard API within a given ID range. Ignores any items that return a 404 or error.
      Parameters:
      startId - starting item ID (inclusive)
      endId - ending item ID (inclusive)
      Returns:
      a list of ItemPojo objects with valid data

    • createCharacter

      @PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @RequestMapping(path="/characters", method=POST) public Character createCharacter(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreateCharacterDto incomingCharacter, Principal principal)
      Creates a new character for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      incomingCharacter - DTO containing character name, race ID, and class ID
      principal - the authenticated user making the request
      Returns:
      the created Character object
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if name is taken or DAO fails

    • getAllCharacters

      @PreAuthorize("permitAll") @RequestMapping(path="/characters", method=GET) public List<Character> getAllCharacters()

    • deleteExistingCharacter

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @RequestMapping(path="/characters/{id}", method=DELETE) public void deleteExistingCharacter(@PathVariable int id, Principal principal)

    • updateInventory

      @PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @ResponseStatus(OK) @RequestMapping(path="/equippedinventory/{id}", method=PUT) public EquippedInventory updateInventory(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid EquippedInventory incomingInventory, @PathVariable int id, Principal principal)
      Updates the equipped inventory items for a specific character.
      Parameters:
      incomingInventory - updated inventory with new item IDs
      id - the character ID to update
      principal - the user making the request
      Returns:
      updated EquippedInventory object
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if character doesn't exist or isn't owned by user
